5c0a75e6-854f-47c7-88ef-3060494e185c.name: Diffuse
5c0a75e6-854f-47c7-88ef-3060494e185c.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

860de648-6cdb-4c17-984d-e3eaea7dfc42.name: Homogenous
860de648-6cdb-4c17-984d-e3eaea7dfc42.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

ca2e792d-1713-499f-960d-715efd88aeb3.name: No Blood
ca2e792d-1713-499f-960d-715efd88aeb3.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

ed7f2e5d-8e1d-4a08-9e02-6990424fb1fa.name: No Brain
ed7f2e5d-8e1d-4a08-9e02-6990424fb1fa.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

43654dae-274a-4b02-9b6e-07f906e5bdcb.name: No Eyes
43654dae-274a-4b02-9b6e-07f906e5bdcb.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

64873485-3bdd-415f-9130-fc1ffa9987bf.name: No Head
64873485-3bdd-415f-9130-fc1ffa9987bf.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

38227273-7186-4697-9c3b-9ed170b399f6.name: No Neck
38227273-7186-4697-9c3b-9ed170b399f6.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

37238127-b7ad-407f-9a95-cf742967e5ce.name: No Vitals
37238127-b7ad-407f-9a95-cf742967e5ce.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

d6720394-56cc-436f-ab12-d1c8de2cd3d6.name: Unliving
d6720394-56cc-436f-ab12-d1c8de2cd3d6.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5

ff453f37-f63f-4e7d-a2a6-8e200417bd74.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

776d6695-c9d7-4b7c-bd7e-36b88079b4b7.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

05512afc-3b34-49cf-a9e6-b4694110bd99.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

8cf19dfe-0fa6-4826-8e74-84c81e2fd13c.name: No Neck
8cf19dfe-0fa6-4826-8e74-84c81e2fd13c.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

278487c5-c604-4acf-8239-7ce3fdce651b.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

d671ef8c-d1e7-40fd-9ff7-3a45e3385800.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5

481fecf1-020d-4492-a983-bd2d23b80d3f.name: Laziness
481fecf1-020d-4492-a983-bd2d23b80d3f.notes: Your chances of getting a raise or promotion in any job are halved. If you are self-employed, halve your monthly pay.

6c6cc259-2299-4390-8d8d-adad822551f8.name: Blindness
6c6cc259-2299-4390-8d8d-adad822551f8.notes: -6 to all combat skills; cannot target hit locations
